talent.name: Blossom of Slashes
talent.description:
Evaluation Basis: [Resonance Assessment 2083-G]

Resonator Taoqi experienced her Forte-Awakening 3 years ago, with no identifiable triggering event.

Resonator Taoqi's Tacet Mark is located in the interscapular region. Post-Awakening observations have not found any notable physical changes. Tests indicate that Taoqi's skin possesses a heightened level of toughness compared to the average individual. 

She possesses the ability to generate a unique force field, creating a protective barrier to shield herself and others from potential harm.
Taoqi's Resonance Spectrum Pattern shows no resemblance to known samples. The cause of her Awakening remains unknown.


Analysis of test samples has revealed a non-convergent Rabelle's Curve with a stable rise. Occasional fluctuations within normal range have been detected. Therefore, Taoqi is classified as a Natural Resonator.

combo_teaching.title: Taoqi: <color=#d4bf5f>Basic Attack</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Swing the giant blade and launch up to 4 consecutive strikes, dealing <color=#e649a6>Havoc damage</color>.

combo_teaching.title: Taoqi: <color=#d4bf5f>Heavy Attack</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Consume STA and enter <color=#f4d582>Rocksteady Defense</color> state. Release Heavy Attack button to end <color=#f4d582>Rocksteady Defense</color> and immediately launch an attack, dealing <color=#e649a6>Havoc DMG</color>.

combo_teaching.title: Taoqi: <color=#d4bf5f>Mid-air Attack</color> Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Consume STA to launch a Plunging Attack mid-air, dealing <color=#e649a6>Havoc DMG</color>.

combo_teaching.title: Taoqi: Resonance Skill Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Cast "Fortified Defense", dealing <color=#e649a6>Havoc Damage</color> to surrounding targets, and generating 3 <color=#f4d582>Rocksteady Shield</color>. Incoming attacks at this time will trigger <color=#f4d582>Strategic Parry</color> to retaliate against the target.

combo_teaching.title: Taoqi: Resonance Liberation Tutorial
combo_teaching.description: Launch an attack based on Taoqi's DEF to the target, dealing <color=#e649a6>Havoc damage</color> and slowing down targets nearby.

combo_teaching.title: Taoqi: <color=#d4bf5f>Heavy Attack</color> Tutorial <color=#d4bf5f>Strategic Parry</color>
combo_teaching.description:
Focus on Defense and take reduced damage under the <color=#f4d582>Rocksteady Defense</color> state.
During <color=#f4d582>Rocksteady Defense</color>, when attacked or the charge is complete, launch <color=#f4d582>Strategic Parry</color>, counterattacking the target, dealing <color=#e649a6>Havoc damage</color>.

combo_teaching.title: Taoqi: Forte Circuit Tutorial <color=#f4d582>Timed Counters</color>
combo_teaching.description: When <color=#f4d582>Heavy Attack: Strategic Parry</color> is successfully triggered, perform up to three follow-up attacks, dealing <color=#e649a6>Havoc DMG</color>, considered as Basic Attack DMG. Each follow-up attack consumes "Resolving Caliber" on hit to grant a shield.
